/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, lined with buildings on both sides, stretches out into the distance, flanked by trees that add a touch of green to the urban landscape. Cars are parked neatly along the side of the road, hinting at the city's vibrant life. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is captured from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the view.
